description.value:
Special: Accurate, Felling (8)

Note: Unique Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Living non-Daemon or Machine creatures damaged by this make -20 Toughness test or lose hit body part as it turns to glass. Instant death if it’s the head or body, or if creature fails test by 3+ DoF. Burning a fate point to survive instead renders creature unconcious for 1d10+5 minutes.
